## VisibleTileSet.forEachVisibleTile() method

Process callback function \[\[fun\]\] with each visible tile in set.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEachVisibleTile(fun: (tile: Tile) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fun | (tile: [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | The callback function to be called. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
